程序包 org.apache.commons.cli.avalon

类 CLOption

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.cli.avalon.CLOption
public final class CLOption extends Object
Basic class describing an instance of option.

  • 字段概要

    修饰符和类型

    说明
    static final int
    TEXT_ARGUMENT
    Value of CLOptionDescriptor.getId() when the option is a text argument.
